  • public class MouseEvent
extends Event

      • MouseEvent

        public MouseEvent(int x,
          int y,
          int button)
        Create a MouseEvent at the specified location with the specified button index.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location of the Mouse cursor at the time of the Event.
        y - The vertical location of the Mouse cursor at the time of the Event.
        button - The button that may have been used to cause the Event.
